VP ADD FORMULA NAME.Syntax: **VP ADD FORMULA NAME** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *vpFormula* : Text ; *name* : Text { ; *options* : Object } )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP ADD FORMULA NAME.Summary: creates or modifies a named formula in the open document

VP ADD RANGE NAME.Syntax: **VP ADD RANGE NAME** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *name* : Text { ; *options* : Object } )
VP ADD RANGE NAME.Summary: creates or modifies a named range in the open document

VP ADD SELECTION.Summary: adds the specified cells to the currently selected cells

VP ADD SHEET.Syntax:
**VP ADD SHEET** ( *vpAreaName* : Text )
**VP ADD SHEET** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *index* : Integer )
**VP ADD SHEET** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *sheet* : Integer ; *name* : Text )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP ADD SHEET.Summary: inserts a sheet in the document loaded in *vpAreaName*.

VP ADD STYLESHEET.Syntax: **VP ADD STYLESHEET** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *styleName* : Text ; *styleObj* : Object { ; *sheet* : Integer } )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP ADD STYLESHEET.Summary: creates or modifies the *styleName* style sheet based upon the combination of the properties specified in *styleObj* in the open document

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP All.Summary: returns a new range object referencing all cells

VP Cell.Syntax: **VP Cell** ( *vpAreaName* ; *column* : Integer ; *row* : Integer ; Text { ; *sheet* : Integer } )  : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Range object of a single cell
VP Cell.Summary: returns a new range object referencing a specific cell

VP Cells.Syntax: **VP Cells** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *column*: Integer ; *row*: Integer ; *columnCount* : Integer ; *rowCount* : Integer { ; *sheet* : Integer } ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Cells.Summary: returns a new range object referencing specific cells

VP Column.Syntax: **VP Column** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *column*: Integer ; *columnCount* : Integer { ; *sheet* : Integer } ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Column.Summary: returns a new range object referencing a specific column or columns

VP COLUMN AUTOFIT.Summary: automatically sizes the column(s) in *rangeObj* according to their contents

VP Combine ranges.Syntax: **VP Combine ranges** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *otherRangeObj* : Object {;...*otherRangeObjN* : Object }  ) : Object
VP Combine ranges.Summary: returns a new range object that incorporates two or more existing range objects

VP Convert from 4D View.Summary: allows you to convert a legacy 4D View document into a 4D View Pro object

VP Convert to picture.Syntax: **VP Convert to picture** ( *vpObject* : Object {; *rangeObj* : Object} ) : Picture
Params: 4D View Pro object containing the area to convert
VP Convert to picture.Summary: converts the *vpObject* 4D View Pro object (or the *rangeObj* range within *vpObject*) to a SVG picture

VP Copy to object.Syntax: **VP Copy to object** ( *rangeObj* : Object {; *options* : Object} ) : Object
Params: Object returned. Contains the copied data
VP Copy to object.Summary: copies the contents, style and formulas from *rangeObj* to an object

VP CREATE TABLE.Syntax: **VP CREATE TABLE** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *tableName* : Text {; *source* : Text} {; *options* : Object} )
Params: Data context property name to display in the table
VP CREATE TABLE.Summary: creates a table in the specified range

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP EXPORT DOCUMENT.Summary: exports the 4D View Pro object attached to the 4D View Pro area *vpAreaName* to a document on disk according to the *filePath* and *paramObj* parameters

VP Export to object.Syntax: **VP Export to object** ( *vpAreaName* : Text {; *options* : Object} ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Export to object.Summary: returns the 4D View Pro object attached to the 4D View Pro area *vpAreaName*

VP Find.Syntax:
**VP Find** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *searchValue* : Text ) : Object
**VP Find** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *searchValue* : Text ; *searchCondition* : Object } ) : Object
**VP Find** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *searchValue* : Text ; *searchCondition* : Object ; *replaceValue* : Text ) : Object

VP Find table.Summary: returns the name of the table to which to the *rangeObj* cell belongs

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP FLUSH COMMANDS.Summary: immediately executes stored commands and clears the command buffer

VP Font to object.Summary: returns an object from a font shorthand string

VP Get active cell.Syntax: **VP Get active cell** (  *vpAreaName* : Text { ; *sheet* : Integer } ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Get active cell.Summary: returns a new range object referencing the cell which has the focus and where new data will be entered (the active cell)

Params: Name of the attribute bound to the cell
VP Get binding path.Summary: returns the name of the attribute bound to the cell specified in *rangeObj*

VP Get cell style.Summary: returns a style object for the first cell in the *rangeObj*

VP Get column attributes.Summary: returns a collection of properties for any column in the *rangeObj*

VP Get column count.Syntax: **VP Get column count** ( *vpAreaName* : Text { ; *sheet* :  Integer } ) : Integer
Params: 4D View Pro area from object name
VP Get column count.Summary: returns the total number of columns from the designated *sheet*

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Get current sheet.Summary: returns the index of the current sheet in *vpAreaName*. The current sheet is the selected sheet in the document.

VP Get data context.Syntax:
**VP Get data context** ( *vpAreaName* : Text {; *sheet* : Integer } ) : Object
**VP Get data context** ( *vpAreaName* : Text {; *sheet* : Integer } ) : Collection
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Index of the sheet to get the data context from
VP Get data context.Summary: returns the current data context of a worksheet

VP Get default style.Syntax: **VP Get default style** ( *vpAreaName* : Text { ; *sheet* :  Integer } ) : Integer
Params: 4D View Pro area from object name
VP Get default style.Summary: returns a default style object for a sheet

VP Get formula.Summary: retrieves the formula from a designated cell range

VP Get formula by name.Syntax: **VP Get formula by name** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *name* : Text { ; *scope* : Number } ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Named formula or named range definition
VP Get formula by name.Summary: returns the formula and comment corresponding to the named range or named formula passed in the *name* parameter, or **null** if it does not exist in the defined scope

VP Get formulas.Summary: retrieves the formulas from a designated *rangeObj*

VP Get frozen panes.Syntax: **VP Get frozen panes** ( vpAreaName : Text { ; sheet : Integer } ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Object containing frozen column and row information
VP Get frozen panes.Summary: returns an object with information about the frozen columns and rows in *vpAreaName*

VP Get names.Syntax: **VP Get names** ( vpAreaName : Text { ; scope : Number } ) : Collection
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Existing names in the defined scope
VP Get names.Summary: returns a collection of all defined "names" in the current sheet or in the scope designated by the *scope* parameter

VP Get print info.Syntax: **VP Get print info** ( vpAreaName : Text { ; sheet : Integer } ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Get print info.Summary: returns an object containing the print attributes of the *vpAreaName*

VP Get row attributes.Syntax: **VP Get row attributes** ( rangeObj : Object ) : Collection
VP Get row attributes.Summary: returns a collection of properties for any row in the *rangeObj*

VP Get row count.Syntax: **VP Get row count** ( *vpAreaName* : Text {; *sheet* : Integer } ) : Integer
Params: 4D View Pro area from object name
VP Get row count.Summary: returns the total number of rows from the designated *sheet*

Params: 4D View Pro area from object name
VP Get selection.Summary: returns a new range object referencing the current selected cells

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Get sheet count.Summary: returns the number of sheets in the document loaded in *vpAreaName*.

VP Get sheet index.Syntax: **VP Get sheet index** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *name* : Text ) : Integer
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Get sheet index.Summary: returns the index of a sheet based on its name in *vpAreaName*.

VP Get sheet name.Syntax: **VP Get sheet name** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *sheet* : Integer ) : Text
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Get sheet name.Summary: returns the name of a sheet based on its index in *vpAreaName*.

VP Get sheet options.Syntax: **VP Get sheet options** ( *vpAreaName* : Text {; *sheet* : Integer } ) ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area from object name
VP Get sheet options.Summary: returns an object containing the current sheet options of the *vpAreaName* area

VP Get show print lines.Syntax: **VP Get show print lines** ( *vpAreaName* : Text {; *sheet* : Integer } ) : Boolean
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
True if print lines are visible, False otherwise
VP Get show print lines.Summary: returns `True` if the print preview lines are visible and `False` if they are hidden.

Params: Object of cell spans in the defined range
VP Get spans.Summary: retrieves the cell spans in the designated *rangeObj*

VP Get stylesheet.Syntax: **VP Get stylesheet** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *styleName* : Text { ; *sheet* : Integer } ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Get stylesheet.Summary: returns the *styleName* style sheet object containing the property values which have been defined

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Get stylesheets.Summary: returns the collection of defined style sheet objects from the designated *sheet*

VP Get table column attributes.Syntax: **VP Get table column attributes** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *tableName* : Text ; *column* : Integer {; *sheet* : Integer } ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Index of the column in the table
VP Get table column attributes.Summary: returns the current attributes of the specified *column* in the *tableName*

VP Get table column index.Syntax: **VP Get table column index** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *tableName* : Text ; *columnName* : Text {; *sheet* : Integer } ) : Integer
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Get table column index.Summary: returns the index of the *columnName* in the *tableName*

VP Get table range.Syntax: **VP Get table range** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *tableName* : Text {; *onlyData* : Integer {; *sheet* : Integer }} ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
`vk table full range` (default) or `vk table data range`
4D View Pro area form object name
Text collection with all table names
VP Get tables.Summary: returns a collection of all table names defined in the *sheet*

VP Get value.Summary: retrieves a cell value from a designated cell range

VP Get values.Summary: retrieves the values from the designated *rangeObj*

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name

Get workbook options.Summary: returns an object containing all the workbook options in *vpAreaName*

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP IMPORT DOCUMENT.Summary: imports and displays the document designated by *filePath* in the 4D View Pro area *vpAreaName*

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP IMPORT FROM OBJECT.Summary: imports and displays the *viewPro* 4D View Pro object in the *vpAreaName* 4D View Pro area

VP INSERT TABLE COLUMNS.Syntax: **VP INSERT TABLE COLUMNS** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *tableName* : Text ; *column* : Integer {; *count* : Integer {; *insertAfter* : Integer {; *sheet* : Integer }}} )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Index in the table of the starting column to insert
Number of columns to add (must be >0)
`vk table insert before` or `vk table insert after` *column*
VP INSERT TABLE COLUMNS.Summary: inserts one or *count* empty column(s) in the specified *tableName* at the specified *column* index

VP INSERT TABLE ROWS.Syntax: **VP INSERT TABLE ROWS** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *tableName* : Text ; *row* : Integer {; *count* : Integer {; *insertAfter* : Integer {; *sheet* : Integer }}} )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Index in the table of the starting row to insert
Number of rows to add (must be >0)
`vk table insert before` or `vk table insert after` *row*
VP INSERT TABLE ROWS.Summary: inserts one or *count* empty row(s) in the specified *tableName* at the specified *row* index

Params: Target range for the values, formatting and formulas
VP MOVE CELLS.Summary: moves or copies the values, style and formulas from *originRange* to *targetRange*

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Name.Summary: returns a new range object referencing a named range

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP NEW DOCUMENT.Summary: loads and display a new, default document in the 4D View Pro form area object *vpAreaName*

VP Object to font.Summary: returns a font shorthand string from *fontObj*

PASTE FROM OBJECT.Syntax: **VP PASTE FROM OBJECT** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *dataObject* : Object {; *options* : Longint} )
Params: Object containing the data to be pasted
PASTE FROM OBJECT.Summary: pastes the contents, style and formulas stored in *dataObject* to the *rangeObj* object

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP PRINT.Summary: opens a print dialog window to print *vpAreaName*

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
4D View Pro area form object name
Name of the named range or named formula to remove
VP REMOVE NAME.Summary: removes the named range or named formula passed in the *name* parameter in the defined *scope*

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Index of the sheet to remove
VP REMOVE SHEET.Summary: removes the sheet with the specified *index* from the document loaded in *vpAreaName*

VP REMOVE SPAN.Summary: removes the span from the cells in *rangeObj*

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP REMOVE STYLESHEET.Summary: removes the style sheet passed in the *styleName* from the *vpAreaName*

VP REMOVE TABLE.Syntax: **VP REMOVE TABLE** ( *vpAreaName* : Object; *tableName* : Text {; *options* : Integer} {; *sheet* : Integer}} )
Params: Name of the table to remove

VP REMOVE TABLE COLUMNS.Syntax: **VP REMOVE TABLE COLUMNS** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *tableName* : Text ; *column* : Integer {; *count* : Integer {; *sheet* : Integer }}} )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Index in the table of the starting column to remove
Number of columns to remove (must be >0)
VP REMOVE TABLE COLUMNS.Summary: removes one or *count* column(s) in the specified *tableName* at the specified *column* index

VP REMOVE TABLE ROWS.Syntax: **VP REMOVE TABLE ROWS** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *tableName* : Text ; *row* : Integer {; *count* : Integer {; *sheet* : Integer }}} )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Index in the table of the starting row to remove
Number of rows to remove (must be >0)
VP REMOVE TABLE ROWS.Summary: removes one or *count* row(s) from the specified *tableName* at the specified *row* index

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP RESET SELECTION.Summary: deselects all cells, resulting in no current selection or visible active cell

VP RESIZE TABLE.Summary: changes the *tableName* size with regards to the *rangeObj*

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP RESUME COMPUTING.Summary: restarts the calculation of formulas in *vpAreaName*

VP Row.Syntax: **VP Row** ( *vpAreaName* : Text; *row* : Integer { ; *rowCount* : Integer { ; *sheet* : Integer } } ) : Object
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP Row.Summary: returns a new range object referencing a specific row or rows

VP ROW AUTOFIT.Summary: automatically sizes the row(s) in *rangeObj* according to their contents

Params: Object containing the offscreen area's attributes
`.result` property of the `.onEvent` object, or Null if does not return a value
VP Run offscreen area.Summary: creates an offscreen area in memory which can be used to process 4D View Pro area commands and functions

VP SET ACTIVE CELL.Summary: defines a specified cell as active

Params: Allowed methods in the 4D View Pro areas
VP SET ALLOWED METHODS.Summary: designates the project methods that can be called in 4D View Pro formulas

Params: Name of the attribute to bind to *rangeObj*
VP SET BINDING PATH.Summary: binds an attribute from a sheet's data context to *rangeObj*

VP SET BOOLEAN VALUE.Summary: assigns a specified boolean value to a designated cell range

VP SET BORDER.Summary: applies the border style(s) defined in *borderStyleObj* and *borderPosObj* to the range defined in the *rangeObj*

VP SET CELL STYLE.Summary: applies the style(s) defined in the *styleObj* to the cells defined in the *rangeObj*

VP SET COLUMN ATTRIBUTES.Summary: applies the attributes defined in the *propertyObj* to the columns in the *rangeObj*

VP SET COLUMN COUNT.Syntax: **VP SET COLUMN COUNT** ( *vpAreaName* : Text , *columnCount* : Integer { , *sheet* : Integer } )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP SET COLUMN COUNT.Summary: defines the total number of columns in *vpAreaName*

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Index of the new current sheet
4D View Pro area form object name
VP SET CUSTOM FUNCTIONS.Summary: designates the 4D formulas that can be called directly from 4D View Pro formulas

VP SET DATA CONTEXT.Syntax:
**VP SET DATA CONTEXT** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *dataObj* : Object {; *options* : Object } {; *sheet* : Integer} )
**VP SET DATA CONTEXT** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *dataColl* : Collection ; {*options* : Object } {; *sheet* : Integer} )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Data object to load in the data context
Data collection to load in the data context
VP SET DATA CONTEXT.Summary: sets the data context of a sheet

VP SET DATE TIME VALUE.Syntax: **VP SET DATE TIME VALUE** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *dateValue* : Date ; *timeValue* : Time {; *formatPattern* : Text } )
VP SET DATE TIME VALUE.Summary: assigns a specified date and time value to a designated cell range

VP SET DATE VALUE.Syntax: **VP SET DATE VALUE** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *dateValue* : Date { ; *formatPattern* : Text } )
VP SET DATE VALUE.Summary: assigns a specified date value to a designated cell range

VP SET DEFAULT STYLE.Syntax: **VP SET DEFAULT STYLE** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *styleObj* : Object { ; *sheet* : Integer } )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP SET DEFAULT STYLE.Summary: defines the style in the *styleObj* as the default style for a *sheet*

Params: Reference to field in virtual structure
VP SET FIELD.Summary: assigns a 4D database virtual field to a designated cell range

VP SET FORMULA.Summary: assigns a specified formula or 4D method to a designated cell range

VP SET FORMULAS.Summary: assigns a collection of formulas starting at the specified cell range

VP SET FROZEN PANES.Syntax: **VP SET FROZEN PANES** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *paneObj* : Object { ; *sheet* : Integer } )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Object containing frozen column and row information
VP SET FROZEN PANES.Summary: sets the frozen status of the columns and rows in the *paneObj* so they are always displayed in the *vpAreaName*

VP SET NUM VALUE.Syntax: **VP SET NUM VALUE** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *numberValue* : Number { ; *formatPattern* : Text } )
VP SET NUM VALUE.Summary: assigns a specified numeric value to a designated cell range

VP SET PRINT INFO.Syntax: **VP SET PRINT INFO** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *printInfo* : Object { ; *sheet* : Integer }  )
VP SET PRINT INFO.Summary: defines the attributes to use when printing the *vpAreaName*

VP SET ROW ATTRIBUTES.Summary: applies the attributes defined in the *propertyObj* to the rows in the *rangeObj*

VP SET ROW COUNT.Syntax: **VP SET ROW COUNT** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *rowCount* : Integer { ; *sheet* : Integer }  )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP SET ROW COUNT.Summary: defines the total number of rows in *vpAreaName*

VP SET SELECTION.Summary: defines the specified cells as the selection and the first cell as the active cell

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP SET SHEET COUNT.Summary: sets the number of sheets in *vpAreaName*

VP SET SHEET NAME.Syntax: **VP SET SHEET NAME** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *name* : Text {; *sheet*: Integer} )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Index of the sheet to be renamed
VP SET SHEET NAME.Summary: renames a sheet in the document loaded in *vpAreaName*

VP SET SHEET OPTIONS.Syntax: **VP SET SHEET OPTIONS** ( *vpAreaName* : Text; *sheetOptions* : Object { ; *sheet* : Integer}  )
VP SET SHEET OPTIONS.Summary: allows defining various sheet options of the *vpAreaName* area

VP SET SHOW PRINT LINES.Syntax: **VP SET SHOW PRINT LINES** ( *vpAreaName* : Text {; visible : Boolean}{; *sheet* : Integer} )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Print lines displayed if True (default), hidden if False
VP SET SHOW PRINT LINES.Summary: sets whether to display print preview lines in a spreadsheet.

VP SET TABLE COLUMN ATTRIBUTES.Syntax: **VP SET TABLE COLUMN ATTRIBUTES** ( *vpAreaName* : Text ; *tableName* : Text ; *column* : Integer ; *attributes* : Object {; *sheet* : Integer } )
Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Index of the column in the table
VP SET TABLE COLUMN ATTRIBUTES.Summary: applies the defined *attributes* to the *column* in the *tableName*

VP SET TEXT VALUE.Syntax: **VP SET TEXT VALUE** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *textValue* : Text { ; *formatPattern* : Text }  )
VP SET TEXT VALUE.Summary: assigns a specified text value to a designated cell range

VP SET TIME VALUE.Syntax: **VP SET TIME VALUE** ( *rangeObj* : Object ; *timeValue* : Text { ; *formatPattern* : Text }  )
VP SET TIME VALUE.Summary: assigns a specified time value to a designated cell range

VP SET VALUE.Summary: assigns a specified value to a designated cell range

VP SET VALUES.Summary: assigns a collection of values starting at the specified cell range

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
Object containing the workbook options to be set
Vertical view position of cell or row
Horizontal view position of cell or row
VP SHOW CELL.Summary: vertically and horizontally repositions the view of the *rangeObj*

Params: 4D View Pro area form object name
VP SUSPEND COMPUTING.Summary: stops the calculation of all formulas in *vpAreaName*
